headline: The Ultimate Guide to REITs: Strategies to Buy, Hold, and Profit
summary: Real estate investment trusts (REITs) can be terrific investment vehicles.  REITs are known for paying dividends.  The IRS requires that REITs pay a minimum of 90% of their taxable income in dividends to maintain their tax advantages (REITs don't pay corporate income taxes).

headline: Is AGNC Investment Stock a Buy Now?
summary: There's an important nuance when it comes to this ultra-high-yield mortgage real estate investment trust (REIT) that you'll want to understand before you consider buying it.  My long-term goal is to create an income stream to supplement Social Security when I retire.  My core holdings include Realty Income (NYSE: O), W.P. Carey (NYSE: WPC), Simon Property Group (NYSE: SPG), and Federal Realty (NYSE: FRT).

headline: Skip Buying a Rental Property. Investing $90,000 in These Stocks Could Make You Over $7,000 in Annual Passive Income.
summary: Several of my friends and family members own or have owned rental properties.  It can be a great way to generate passive income.  Headaches of owning rental properties include dealing with difficult tenants and unexpected repair costs.
